```{=html}
<!-- Chart container -->
<div class="chart-container" style="position: relative; height: 400px; width: 100%;">
  <canvas id="bau2020Chart"></canvas>
</div>

<!-- Load Chart.js library -->
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js"></script>

<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
fetch('data/lulc-2020-perc_area.json')
  .then(response => response.json())
  .then(data => {
    // Invert the JSON: values = labels, keys = percentages
    const labels = Object.values(data).map(arr => arr[0]);
    const values = Object.keys(data).map(k => parseFloat(k));

    // Palette keyed by your shorthand names
    const LULC_pal = {
      "urban": "#a8aba5",
      "static": "#d1d3cf",
      "open_forest": "#97d1d5",
      "closed_forest": "#29898f",
      "shrubland": "#bb8a75",
      "int_ag": "#f59f78",
      "alp_past": "#6ca147",
      "grassland": "#c4e0a1",
      "perm_crops": "#DDCC66",
      "glacier": "#d5f1ff",
      "river": "#93d0ee",
      "lake": "#93d0ee"
    };

    const chartData = {
      labels: labels,
      datasets: [{
        data: values,
        backgroundColor: labels.map(l => LULC_pal[l] || "#cccccc"),
        borderWidth: 0
      }]
    };

    const ctx = document.getElementById('bau2020Chart').getContext('2d');
    new Chart(ctx, {
      type: 'bar',
      data: chartData,
      options: {
        responsive: true,
        maintainAspectRatio: false,
        plugins: {
          legend: { display: false },
          title: {
            display: true,
            text: 'BAU - % Area of Land Use Classes in 2020'
          },
          tooltip: {
            callbacks: {
              label: function(context) {
                return context.parsed.y.toFixed(2) + '%';
              }
            }
          }
        },
        scales: {
          y: {
            beginAtZero: true,
            max: 100,
            title: { display: true, text: 'Percentage Area (%)' }
          }
        }
      }
    });
  });
});
</script>

```
